name: Dataset for "Drought stress leads to systemic induced susceptibility to a nectrotrophic fungus associated with mountain pine beetle in Pinus banksiana seedlings"
description: This dataset is from a study that investigated the impact of drought on induced defenses from initial attack and resistance to subsequent biotic attacks in greenhouse grown jack pine seedlings.

distribution.name: Greenhouse_monoterpene_lesion_KLUTSCH2013.tab
